name: Shadow Beast
description: A shadowy form that embodies chaos, this creature is agile and magical, moving effortlessly through shadows and objects, making it a formidable presence in combat.
memorable: Its ability to instill fear and cause necrotic damage makes it a terrifying opponent in dark environments.
goals: To disrupt the plans of its foes and thrive in darkness.
relations: Related to other fey creatures and possibly serves darker entities from the Feywild.
environment: Found in dark or shadowy areas, often in the Feywild.
strengths: High agility, magic resistance, and dangerous necrotic damage output.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity reduces its effectiveness in bright light.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack with a Bite that deals piercing and necrotic damage, and Claw attacks that deal slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Frightful Shadows ability that induces fear and deals significant necrotic damage.
senses: Has keen stealth skills with a +8 modifier, making it very effective at ambushing.
skills: Skilled in Stealth, allowing it to hide and surprise its enemies.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement enables movement through objects and creatures
Magic Resistance provides advantage on saving throws against spells
Immune to conditions like exhaustion, grappled, and poisoned
Resistant to multiple damage types including acid, cold, and fire
Tends to thrive in low-light environments
